mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMUNITY_NO, c.MEMBER_NO, c.COMMUNITY_TITLE, c.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, c.COMMUNITY_REGDATE, c.COMMUNITY_READCOUNT, c.COMMUNITY_DELFLAG , m.MEMBER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY c, MEMBER m WHERE c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC

SELECT c.COMMUNITY_NO, c.MEMBER_NO, c.COMMUNITY_TITLE, c.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, c.COMMUNITY_REGDATE, c.COMMUNITY_READCOUNT, c.COMMUNITY_DELFLAG , m.MEMBER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY c, MEMBER m WHERE c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND c.COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{community_title} || '%' ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC

SELECT c.COMMUNITY_NO, c.MEMBER_NO, c.COMMUNITY_TITLE, c.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, c.COMMUNITY_REGDATE, c.COMMUNITY_READCOUNT, c.COMMUNITY_DELFLAG , m.MEMBER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY c, MEMBER m WHERE c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND c.COMMUNITY_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{community_content} || '%' ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC

SELECT c.COMMUNITY_NO, c.MEMBER_NO, c.COMMUNITY_TITLE, c.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, c.COMMUNITY_REGDATE, c.COMMUNITY_READCOUNT, c.COMMUNITY_DELFLAG , m.MEMBER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY c, MEMBER m WHERE c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND m.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{member_name} || '%' ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC

SELECT c.COMMUNITY_NO, c.MEMBER_NO, c.COMMUNITY_TITLE, c.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, c.COMMUNITY_REGDATE, c.COMMUNITY_READCOUNT, c.COMMUNITY_DELFLAG , m.MEMBER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY c, MEMBER m WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = #{community_no} AND c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO
mapper.delete: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMUNITY_DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = #{community_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_REGDATE FROM COMMUNITY ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO
